name: Local Services Search Engine Management System SQL注入漏洞
product: ["Local Services Search Engine Management System Local Services Search Engine Management System 2.1"]
description: Local Services Search Engine Management System是一个本地服务搜索引擎管理系统。Local Services Search Engine Management System存在SQL注入漏洞，该漏洞源于文件/admin/edit-category-detail.php中参数editid缺少对外部输入SQL语句的验证。攻击者可利用该漏洞执行非法SQL命令窃取数据库敏感数据。
solution:
目前厂商尚未发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://phpgurukul.com/
